**Suggested title:** `[Adaptation]: <target component>`

**Before submitting:** please fill out all required sections.

### Summary of adaptation

**Required:** what was adapted.

Examples:

- module X
- replaced Y logic
- updated parameters / mapping
- updated test Z

### Compatibility notes (if any)

Optional: behavior differences vs `cisco.ios` (parameters removed/added, idempotency differences, known device OS
quirks).

### Checklist

- [ ] Pre-commit checks passed
- [ ] Idempotency verified
- [ ] Code tested
- [ ] Documentation updated
